title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with John Heitinga regarding the coach’s move to Amsterdam. Heitinga is signing a contract with Ajax as head coach until June 30, 2027. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant and is signing a contract of the same ...

title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: On 19 May 2023, Sven Mislintat took over as Ajax's sports director. He succeeded Marc Overmars, who left in early 2022. Mislintat appointed Maurice Steijn as head coach. Mislintat spent approximately 111 million euros on transfers. Ajax had its worst start to the season in fifty-nine years.

title: Francesco Farioli new Ajax head coach
snippet: We don't want to waste any time getting ready for the new season and bringing Ajax back to where it belongs." On Thursday, Francesco Farioli was presented as Ajax's new head coach in the Johan Cruijff ArenA.

title: r/soccer on Reddit: [VI] Fred Grim will be Ajax first team head coach until at least the winter break
snippet: [Romano] Ajax have agreed deal to appoint John Heitinga as new head coach on two year contract.
